title: DLOG_STORE_FILE_CSV Module
description:
DLOG_STORE_FILE_CSV is for logging (recording) of the 

process values in a CSV formatted fle. The data can be passed with the 

modules DLOG_DINT, DLOG_REAL, DLOG_STRING, DLOG_DT. The 

parameter TRIG_M (positive pulse) is used to manually trigger (start) the 

storage of process data. With Parameters TRIG_T an automatic timeï¿¾controlled release can be realized. If the current date / time value divided 

by the parameterized TRIG_T value with residual value is 0, then a Save is 

performed. 

This also ensures that the store is always performed at the same time
name: DLOG_STORE_FILE_CSV

input.name: X
input.description: The DLOG data structure containing the process values to be logged.

input.name: ENABLE
input.description: A boolean flag to enable or disable data recording.

input.name: TRIG_M
input.description: A manual trigger that starts the storage of process data upon receiving a positive pulse.

input.name: TRIG_T
input.description: An automatic trigger for cyclic storage based on time intervals.

input.name: FILE NAME
input.description: The name of the file (including path if necessary) where the data will be stored.

input.name: DTI
input.description: The current date and time value to be used in data processing.

input.name: SEP
input.description: The ASCII code of the delimiter used to separate recorded elements in the CSV file.

output.name: ERROR_C
output.description: An error code indicating the status of the logging operation.

output.name: ERROR_T
output.description: A code indicating the type of problem encountered.
